Investigator Sally: Oh, thank you so much, that's really cool of you. I wish I was tough like you... or heck, even as tough as my little niece Gretzka. She's a tough little cookie. Anyway, that's not important. What is important is that you bring me samples of the plants on the Plains. I need one bag of spores from the Fantasy Mushroom, one bag of spores from the Sticky Mushroom, and one leaf from the Energy Plant. All of these can be found on the Plains. And this goes without saying, but don't eat them until I have a chance to study them!
